text: DON'T MISS 'Keep up the good work': TOWIE's Gemma Collins stuns fans with her remarkable weight loss as she flaunts her new figure in a series of skintight ensembles 'That bikini's almost gone!' Skye Wheatley flaunts VERY ample assets and plump pout in revealing bikini selfie Who needs AGT? Jesinta Campbell shows off ripped torso and slender frame as she poses for sweaty gym selfie Ryan Gosling, Rooney Mara, Natalie Portman and Michael Fassbender get caught in two love triangles in Song To Song trailer Ready for rain! David Beckham continues his charm offensive by sharing snaps of his family skiing in Canada - while 'brave boy' Brooklyn waits off-piste with his arm in a sling Nearly naked: Kylie Jenner almost spills out of top as she models her newly released DropOne collection with sister Kendall in sexy promo video Baby on board! Pregnant Danielle Lloyd showcases her baby bump in chic khaki tee at charity launch, before changing into a glam frock for date night 'I'm less confident in my own skin': Chloe Sims reveals recent weight gain and punishing TOWIE schedule have left her feeling 'uncomfortable' and 'exhausted' 'Keep it honest and be yourself': Beverly Hills socialite Lisa Vanderpump offers words of advice to Real Housewives Of Sydney stars 'I've got to get out of this country': Stephen Bear jets on holiday with his dog after admitting he feels 'stressed'... following reported split from Charlotte Crosby Close call! TOWIE's Chloe Lewis steps out in a chic white shirt for LFW... as doppleganger Missé Beqiri heads to another catwalk show on the same night Fitness secrets: Adele's personal trainer Pete Geracimo reveals how the singer slimmed down, boosted her energy, and stays feeling fresh Baby bump! Binky Felstead displays her flourishing stomach in navy maxi dress alongside beau Josh 'JP' Patterson at Joshua Kane's AW17 London Fashion Week show 'Telly can be brutal': Gabby Logan, the queen of TV sports presenting, on how her battle to move into light entertainment keeps on backfiring Karl Stefanovic's estranged wife Cassandra Thorburn, 44, dashes to her car barefoot during solo outing Beauties and the beast: Back in a new series of Billions, Damian Lewis on skinny-dipping with his sexy co-star - and the bombshell who'll never be a trophy wife Making a splash! Eye-catching Fearne Cotton comes up roses in a pretty embroidered coat as she bikes into work at BBC Radio 2 The Princess who wore her heart on her sleeve: An exclusive preview of a blockbuster royal exhibition of Diana's most dazzling dresses Call the feisty new midwife: New recruit Jennifer Kirby tells how her character Valerie will ruffle feathers among her buttoned-up colleagues in the hit show 'Divorce is the best thing that happened to me': Jo Wood says she's forgiven Ronnie, adores his new wife and their twins - and reveals she's found love again Vogue Williams dazzles in glamorous black wrap dress as she steps out on crutches for LFW despite painful knee injury Warren Frost, character actor famous for playing Dr Will Hayward on 'Twin Peaks,' dies at 91 Appeared in dozens of iconic TV shows Letting rip! Love Island beauty Olivia Buckland flashes the flesh in almost completely torn jeans and racy sheer top at Rocky Star LFW show Millie Mackintosh joins beau Hugo Taylor at LFW bash, as she's seen for first time since Pro Green announced his 'engagement' to Fae Williams Anything she can do, I can do better! Nicola Hughes gives ex Alex Mytton's new girlfriend Lottie Moss a run for her money as she makes her LFW catwalk debut Showing them how it's done! Enormous tree smashes through model Ireland Baldwin's backyard as fierce storm batters California Blocked in by the tree 'Where it all began!': Halle Berry, 50, looks as beautiful now as she did in throwback snap of herself as Miss USA at 1986 Miss World contest Busting out! Baywatch star Charlotte McKinney suffers a wardrobe malfunction while wearing a very risque swimsuit on the beach in Miami His firm's lost £1 million and she's had a string of flops, but can Donna Air and Kate's brother James Middleton be luckier in love than they are in business? Dressed WAY down! Pregnant Beyonce is unusually glam-free in T-shirt and sneakers as she shops in Beverly Hills after stunning at Grammys Break it like Beckham! Brooklyn posts video showing the nasty fall on the ski slopes that broke his collarbone and an X-ray of the injury Lady Victoria Hervey, 40, turns heads as she goes braless in daring nude sheer cutout jumpsuit at Joshua Kane LFW presentation Giving it another shot! Mischa Barton spotted finally moving into her new apartment following U-Haul crash on Saturday after a tough few months Family of Voice star Christina Grimmie releases her new song Invisible nearly one year after the 22-year-old was murdered by a deranged fan Oh mama! Kourtney Kardashian looks ravishing in flashback images from Costa Rica... as it's claimed ex Scott Disick wants a spinoff Kim Kardashian denies plans to return to Paris, where she was robbed five months ago, for fashion week in response to rumours Soapwatch: Jaci Stephen's ultimate guide to the week's soaps As another Valentine's Day passes, one can only reflect once more how unlucky in love everyone is in soapland. Lee Carter leaves Whitney and Walford, pushing her ever closer to his father. For now Danny Dyer seemed more worried about foxes and weasels taking over EastEnders, by Jim Shelley Jennifer Garner and daughter Seraphina brave the storms in LA... as divorce from Ben Affleck looms The lookalike duo both donned rain boots 'I'm finding my inner Dingle': Sally Dexter reveals how she's relished swapping the chilly glamour of Poldark for her chatty, catty role on Emmerdale What happens when two female colleagues hate each other - and one thinks the other's after her job? New thriller The Replacement is laced with Hitchcockian tension Naked under a mink coat, Marilyn Monroe DID seduce her French lover. But does this photograph REALLY prove that he made her pregnant? Real life Hollywood wife! Famed writer Jackie Collins' $3m estate to hit auction block with her luxe 6-carat diamond ring and gold sports car are up for grabs Smiles for twin-kle toes Anton Du Beke, 50, and his girlfriend Hannah Summers, 41, as they enjoy a walk ahead becoming first-time parents later this spring Style runs in the family!
